entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
